label: Agricultural Facility
original_definition: A Facility that is designed as a building or campus for agricultural processes with the aim of cultivating animals, plants, or fungi for food, fiber, biofuel, medicinal plants, or other products to sustain and enhance human life.
enriched_definition: A Facility that is designed to support agricultural processes for the cultivation of animals, plants, or fungi to produce food, fiber, biofuel, medicinal plants, or other products used to sustain and enhance human life.

label: Aircraft Manufacturing Facility
original_definition: A Factory that is designed to manufacture Aircraft.
enriched_definition: A manufacturing facility that is designed to produce aircraft and aircraft components through industrial processes including assembly, fabrication, and quality control operations.

label: Airport
original_definition: A Transportation Facility that is designed for launching, receiving, and housing Aircraft.
enriched_definition: A Transportation Facility that is designed to enable the takeoff, landing, and storage of aircraft.

label: Ammunition Depot
original_definition: A Storage Facility that is designed to store Portions of Ammunition.
enriched_definition: A storage facility that is designed to store portions of ammunition.

label: Apartment Building
original_definition: A Residential Facility that is designed to contain multiple permanent residences comprised of a suite of rooms.
enriched_definition: A Residential Facility that is designed to contain multiple permanent residences, each of which consists of a suite of rooms intended for occupancy by a single household.

label: Base of Operations
original_definition: A Military Base with permanently stationed operating forces, robust Infrastructure, and strengthened force protection measures such that it is designed to launch and support large-scale operations, support smaller or less-permanent bases, and organize supply facilities.
enriched_definition: A Military Base that has permanently stationed operating forces, robust infrastructure, and strengthened force protection measures such that it is designed to launch and support large-scale military operations, provide support to smaller or less-permanent military bases, and organize supply facilities.

label: Biological Depot
original_definition: A Storage Facility that is designed to store biological agents.
enriched_definition: A Storage Facility that is designed to store biological agents such as bacteria, viruses, toxins, or other microorganisms that may be used for research, medical, or other purposes.

label: Chemical Depot
original_definition: A Storage Facility that is designed to store chemicals.
enriched_definition: A Storage Facility that is designed to store chemical substances and chemical materials.

label: Chemical Manufacturing Facility
original_definition: A Factory that is designed to manufacture or process chemicals.
enriched_definition: A manufacturing facility that is designed to produce, process, or refine chemical substances through controlled chemical reactions, physical transformations, or purification processes.

label: Church
original_definition: A Religious Facility that is designed for Christian worship and prayer.
enriched_definition: A Religious Facility that is designed to bear the function of supporting Christian worship services and prayer activities.

label: Combat Outpost
original_definition: A Military Facility that is designed to support the conduction of combat operations of limited scope or size.
enriched_definition: A military facility that is designed to support the conduct of combat operations of limited scope or size.

label: Command Post Facility
original_definition: A Military Facility that is designed to support the command and control of Military Operations or Forces.
enriched_definition: A facility that is designed to support the command and control of military operations or forces.

label: Commercial Facility
original_definition: A Facility that is designed for buying and selling goods and services, especially on a large scale.
enriched_definition: A Facility that is designed to enable the buying and selling of goods and services for profit.

label: Communications Facility
original_definition: A Facility that is designed to support processes of receiving or transmitting information.
enriched_definition: A Facility that is designed to enable the receiving, transmitting, or processing of information through technological means such as radio waves, electrical signals, or digital data transmission.

label: Decontamination Facility
original_definition: A Washing Facility that is designed to wash personnel or equipment after (potential) contamination by radioactive, biological, or chemical material.
enriched_definition: A Washing Facility that is designed to remove radioactive, biological, or chemical contaminants from personnel or equipment that have been exposed to such hazardous materials.

label: Distribution Port
original_definition: A Port that is designed with the cargo handling equipment necessary for the loading and unloading of Watercraft
enriched_definition: A port that is designed to bear cargo handling equipment that is necessary for the loading and unloading of watercraft.

label: Educational Facility
original_definition: A Facility that is designed for facilitating learning, or the acquisition of knowledge, skills, values, beliefs, and habits.
enriched_definition: A Facility that is designed to enable the acquisition of knowledge, skills, or competencies through structured learning activities.

label: Electric Power Station
original_definition: A Facility that is designed to generate electrical power.
enriched_definition: A facility that is designed to convert various forms of energy into electrical energy for distribution to consumers.

label: Entertainment Facility
original_definition: A Facility that is designed to host activities that are intended to hold the interest of, or give pleasure or delight to, an audience.
enriched_definition: A Facility that is designed to host activities that are intended to provide amusement, enjoyment, or diversion to an audience.

label: Facility Ontology
original_definition: This ontology is designed to represent buildings and campuses that  are designed to serve some specific purpose and which are common to multiple domains.
enriched_definition: An ontology is a formal specification of concepts and relationships that represents buildings, campuses, and other constructed environments that are designed to serve specific purposes and which are common across multiple domains of application.

label: Factory
original_definition: A Facility that is designed for manufacturing or refining material products.
enriched_definition: A Facility that is designed to house processes and equipment for the manufacturing or refining of material products.

label: Farm
original_definition: An Agricultural Facility that is designed to produce food and other crops.
enriched_definition: An Agricultural Facility that is designed to produce crops, livestock, or other agricultural products through the cultivation of land and the raising of animals.

label: Financial Facility
original_definition: A Facility that is designed to support the management of money.
enriched_definition: A Facility that is designed to support the management, storage, transfer, or exchange of monetary assets and financial instruments.

label: Fire Station
original_definition: A Public Safety Facility that is designed for the storage of firefighting apparatus.
enriched_definition: A Public Safety Facility that is designed to house firefighting apparatus and equipment, and serves as a base of operations for firefighting personnel.

label: Fort
original_definition: A Military Facility that is designed to support the defense of or solidification of rule over some Geospatial Region and its inhabitants.
enriched_definition: A Military Facility that is designed to house military personnel and equipment for the purpose of defending a specified Geospatial Region or establishing military control over that region and its population.

label: Forward Operations Base
original_definition: A Military Base that is located relatively close to an offensive Area of Operations, is supported by the Base of Operations, and is designed to support local strategic objectives and tactical operations.
enriched_definition: A Military Base that is positioned in proximity to an Area of Operations to support offensive military activities, receives logistical and operational support from a primary Base of Operations, and is specifically designed to enable the execution of local strategic objectives and tactical military operations.

label: Fossil Fuel Power Plant
original_definition: An Electric Power Station that is designed to convert fossil fuels (e.g. coal, natural gas, or petroleum) into electrical energy.
enriched_definition: A power plant that is designed to convert fossil fuels such as coal, natural gas, or petroleum into electrical energy through combustion processes.

label: Gas Processing Facility
original_definition: A Refinery that is designed for refining natural gas into products of value.
enriched_definition: A Refinery that is designed to process natural gas by separating, purifying, and converting it into commercially valuable products such as methane, ethane, propane, butane, and natural gas liquids.

label: Government Building
original_definition: A Facility that is designed for the administration of a community.
enriched_definition: A Facility that is designed to bear the function of housing governmental administrative activities and operations of a political or administrative community.

label: Grocery Store
original_definition: A Commercial Facility that is designed to sell food.
enriched_definition: A Commercial Facility that is designed to sell food and household goods primarily to individual consumers for personal consumption.

label: Healthcare Facility
original_definition: A Facility that is designed for the diagnosis, treatment, and prevention of disease.
enriched_definition: A Facility that is designed to support the diagnosis, treatment, and prevention of disease in humans.

label: Heliport
original_definition: An Airport that is designed for launching, receiving, and housing Rotorcraft.
enriched_definition: An Airport that is designed to accommodate the takeoff, landing, and storage of rotorcraft.

label: Hospital
original_definition: A Healthcare Facility that is designed to provide patient treatment with specialized staff and equipment.
enriched_definition: A healthcare facility that is designed to provide comprehensive medical treatment to patients through the use of specialized medical staff and equipment for diagnosis, treatment, and care of illness and injury.

label: Hostel
original_definition: A Residential Facility that is designed to temporarily lodge guests in a sociable environment for relatively low costs.
enriched_definition: A Residential Facility that is designed to provide temporary lodging accommodations to guests at relatively low cost and typically features shared common areas and sleeping quarters to facilitate social interaction among occupants.

label: Hotel
original_definition: A Residential Facility that is designed to provide lodging that is paid for on a short-term basis.
enriched_definition: A Residential Facility that is designed to provide temporary lodging accommodations to paying guests on a short-term basis and typically offers additional services such as food service, housekeeping, and concierge services.

label: House
original_definition: A Residential Facility that is designed to provide a self-standing, permanent residence for an individual, family, household, multiple families, or similar-sized group.
enriched_definition: A Residential Facility that is designed to provide a self-standing, permanent residence for one or more persons and that is typically characterized by having separate entrances, private living spaces, and independent utility systems.

label: Hydroelectric Power Plant
original_definition: An Electric Power Station that is designed to convert hydropower into electrical power.
enriched_definition: An electric power station that is designed to convert the kinetic energy of flowing or falling water into electrical energy through the use of turbines and generators.

label: Landfill
original_definition: A Waste Management Facility that is designed for disposing of waste by burial.
enriched_definition: A Waste Management Facility that is designed to dispose of solid waste materials by burial in excavated areas of land and subsequent covering with soil or other materials.

label: Mailing Facility
original_definition: A Facility that is designed for the systematic physical transportation of documents and packages.
enriched_definition: A Facility that is designed to enable the systematic physical transportation and processing of postal items including letters, packages, and other mail materials.

label: Maintenance Facility
original_definition: A Facility that is designed to be used to perform actions to maintain or improve the state of some property or equipment.
enriched_definition: A Facility that is designed to support the performance of acts of artifact maintenance on equipment, vehicles, or other material artifacts.

label: Medical Depot
original_definition: A Storage Facility that is designed to store medical supplies.
enriched_definition: A Storage Facility that is designed to store medical supplies, pharmaceuticals, and healthcare equipment for distribution to healthcare facilities or emergency response operations.

label: Military Base
original_definition: A Military Facility that is designed to shelter military equipment and personnel and to facilitate training and operations.
enriched_definition: A military facility that is designed to provide shelter for military equipment and personnel and to support military training activities and operational missions.

label: Military Facility
original_definition: A Facility that is designed to support a Military Force.
enriched_definition: A Facility that is designed to house, train, or otherwise support the operations of a Military Organization.

label: Military Headquarters Facility
original_definition: A Military Facility that is designed for military administration and coordination.
enriched_definition: A military facility that is designed to house the administrative and operational command functions of a military organization and serves as the primary location from which military leaders direct, coordinate, and control military operations and activities.

label: Mine
original_definition: A Facility that is designed to support the extraction of minerals or other geological materials from an orebody, lode, vein, seam, reef, or placer deposit within the earth.
enriched_definition: A Facility that is designed to support the extraction of minerals or other geological materials from an ore body, lode, vein, seam, reef, or placer deposit located within the Earth.

label: Missile Launch Site
original_definition: A Military Facility that is designed for storing and launching missiles.
enriched_definition: A military facility that is designed to store missiles and has the capability to launch missiles from its location.

label: Mosque
original_definition: A Religious Facility that is designed for Islamic worship and prayer.
enriched_definition: A religious facility that is designed to enable Islamic worship and prayer.

label: Motel
original_definition: A Hotel that is designed to accommodate motor vehicles along with their occupants.
enriched_definition: A hotel that is designed to accommodate motor vehicles and their occupants, typically featuring rooms with direct exterior access and parking spaces adjacent to guest accommodations.

label: Motor Vehicle Manufacturing Facility
original_definition: A Factory that is designed to manufacture automobiles.
enriched_definition: A manufacturing facility that is designed to produce motor vehicles such as automobiles, trucks, buses, and motorcycles.

label: Nuclear Power Plant
original_definition: A Thermal Power Plant that is designed to produce heat by means of a nuclear reactor, which is then converted to electrical energy.
enriched_definition: A Thermal Power Plant that is designed to generate thermal energy by means of controlled nuclear fission reactions within a nuclear reactor and convert that thermal energy into electrical energy.

label: Nuclear Storage Depot
original_definition: A Storage Facility that is designed to store nuclear material.
enriched_definition: A storage facility that is designed to store nuclear materials such as enriched uranium, plutonium, radioactive waste, or other fissile and radioactive substances.

label: Office Building
original_definition: A Commercial Facility that is designed as an environment for conducting commercial, professional, or bureaucratic work.
enriched_definition: A Commercial Facility that is designed to provide an environment for conducting office-based commercial, professional, or bureaucratic work activities.

label: Open Pit Mine
original_definition: A Mine that is designed to support the extraction of materials from the ground directly without using tunnels.
enriched_definition: A mine that is designed to support the extraction of materials from the earth's surface through direct excavation of an open excavation rather than through underground tunnels or shafts.

label: Petrochemical Refinery
original_definition: A Refinery that is designed for refining crude oil, intermediate petroleum products, or synthetic petroleum into products of value.
enriched_definition: A refinery that is designed to process crude oil, intermediate petroleum products, or synthetic petroleum through chemical and physical separation processes to produce refined petroleum products such as gasoline, diesel fuel, heating oil, and petrochemical feedstocks.

label: Petroleum Depot
original_definition: A Storage Facility that is designed to store petroleum, oil, or lubricants.
enriched_definition: A Storage Facility that is designed to store petroleum, oil, and lubricants.

label: Petroleum Manufacturing Facility
original_definition: A Factory that is designed to manufacture petroleum-based products.
enriched_definition: A manufacturing facility that is designed to process crude oil and other petroleum feedstocks into refined petroleum products such as gasoline, diesel fuel, heating oil, and petrochemicals.

label: Pier
original_definition: A Transportation Facility that is designed to partially enclose a harbor and form a landing place for Watercraft.
enriched_definition: A Transportation Facility that is designed to extend from the shore into a body of water and serves as a landing place and docking structure for watercraft.

label: Pipeline
original_definition: A Product Transport Facility that is designed to transport goods or materials through a pipe.
enriched_definition: A Product Transport Facility that is designed to transport liquids, gases, or other materials through a system of connected pipes.

label: Police Station
original_definition: A Public Safety Facility that is designed for the professional and clerical processes of a local police force.
enriched_definition: A Public Safety Facility that is designed to house the administrative, operational, and detention functions of a municipal or regional police force.

label: Port
original_definition: A Transportation Facility that is designed to contain harbors for docking Watercraft and for transfering people or cargo to and from land.
enriched_definition: A Transportation Facility that is designed to contain harbors for docking watercraft and for transferring people or cargo between watercraft and land.

label: Post Office
original_definition: A Mailing Facility that is designed for serving customers of the national postal system.
enriched_definition: A Mailing Facility that is designed to serve customers by providing postal services including mail collection, sorting, and distribution as part of a national postal system.

label: Power Transmission Line
original_definition: A Product Transport Facility that is designed to transmit electricity over distance via a system of above ground wires including their supports.
enriched_definition: A Product Transport Facility that is designed to transmit electrical power over distance by means of a system of overhead conductors and their supporting structures.

label: Product Transport Facility
original_definition: A Facility that is designed to transport some product.
enriched_definition: A Facility that is designed to enable the transportation of manufactured goods, raw materials, or other commercial products from one location to another.

label: Public Safety Facility
original_definition: A Facility that is designed for the prevention of and protection from events that could endanger, injure, or damage the general public.
enriched_definition: A Facility that is designed to enable the prevention of and protection from events that could endanger the safety, health, or welfare of the general public.

label: Pumping Station
original_definition: A Product Transport Facility that is designed to pump fluids from one place to another.
enriched_definition: A facility that is designed to move fluids from one location to another through the use of pumps or other mechanical devices that create pressure differentials to force fluid flow through a system of pipes or conduits.

label: Radio Relay Station
original_definition: A Communications Facility that is designed to support the receiving and re-transmitting of radio signals.
enriched_definition: A communications facility that is designed to receive radio frequency signals and retransmit them to extend the range or coverage area of radio communication networks.

label: Rail Facility
original_definition: A Transportation Facility that is designed for transferring people or cargo to and from Trains.
enriched_definition: A Transportation Facility that is designed to enable the boarding and alighting of passengers or the loading and unloading of cargo from railway vehicles.

label: Refinery
original_definition: A Factory that is designed for refining raw materials into products of value.
enriched_definition: A Factory that is designed to process raw materials through purification, separation, or chemical transformation to produce refined products of greater value or utility.

label: Religious Facility
original_definition: A Facility that is designed for worship and prayer.
enriched_definition: A Facility that is designed to enable the performance of religious worship activities and prayer.

label: Reservoir
original_definition: A Storage Facility that is designed to store water in a man-made open enclosure or area.
enriched_definition: A Storage Facility that is designed to store water in an artificial open enclosure or designated area.

label: Residential Facility
original_definition: A Facility that is designed to house one or more Persons.
enriched_definition: A Facility that is designed to provide living accommodations for one or more human beings on a long-term basis.

label: School
original_definition: An Education Facility that is designed to provide learning space and environments for teaching of students under the direction of teachers.
enriched_definition: An education facility that is designed to provide learning spaces and learning environments for the teaching of students under the direction of teachers.

label: Seat of Local Government
original_definition: A Government Building that is designed for the administration of a local community.
enriched_definition: A Government Building that is designed to house the administrative offices and functions of a local governmental authority such as a municipality, county, or other local jurisdiction.

label: Seat of National Government
original_definition: A Government Building that is designed for the administration of a sovereign nation.
enriched_definition: A Government Building that is designed to house the primary administrative offices and functions of a sovereign nation's central government.

label: Sewage Treatment Facility
original_definition: A Waste Management Facility that is designed for removing contaminants from wastewater, especially sewage.
enriched_definition: A Waste Management Facility that is designed to remove contaminants from wastewater and sewage through physical, chemical, and biological treatment processes.

label: Shop
original_definition: A Commercial Facility designed to sell small lots of goods to consumers.
enriched_definition: A Commercial Facility that is designed to sell goods in small quantities directly to individual consumers for personal use.

label: Stage
original_definition: An Entertainment Facility that is designed to provide a space upon which entertaining performances or productions can occur.
enriched_definition: An Entertainment Facility that is designed to provide a designated performance area where actors, musicians, dancers, or other performers present live entertainment to an audience.

label: Storage Facility
original_definition: A Facility that is designed to store materials or goods.
enriched_definition: A Facility that is designed to house, contain, and preserve materials, goods, or other artifacts for future use or distribution.

label: Synagogue
original_definition: A Religious Facility that is designed for Judaic worship and prayer.
enriched_definition: A religious facility that is designed to bear the function of facilitating Jewish worship, prayer, and religious instruction.

label: Terrorist Training Camp
original_definition: A Training Camp designed to teach students methods of terrorism.
enriched_definition: A training camp that is designed to teach students methods, techniques, and tactics for conducting acts of terrorism.

label: Thermal Power Plant
original_definition: An Electric Power Station that is designed to convert heat energy into electrical energy.
enriched_definition: A facility that is designed to convert thermal energy into electrical energy through the use of heat sources such as fossil fuels, nuclear reactions, or geothermal energy to generate steam or hot gases that drive turbines connected to electrical generators.

label: Training Camp
original_definition: A Facility that is designed for rigorous and focused training in order to learn or improve skills, usually involving physical actions.
enriched_definition: A Facility that is designed to enable intensive and systematic training activities aimed at developing or enhancing specific skills or capabilities through structured instruction and practice.

label: Transportation Facility
original_definition: A Facility that is designed for commencing or concluding the transportation of transportation artifacts, or for housing transportation artifacts.
enriched_definition: A Facility that is designed to enable the beginning or ending of transportation processes involving transportation artifacts, or to provide storage or maintenance space for transportation artifacts.

label: Underground Mine
original_definition: A Mine that is designed to support the extraction of materials from the ground using underground tunnels and shafts.
enriched_definition: A mine that is designed to enable the extraction of materials from subsurface locations through the use of subterranean tunnels, shafts, and chambers.

label: Underwater Mine
original_definition: A Mine that is designed to support the extraction of materials from the ocean floor.
enriched_definition: A facility that is designed to support the extraction of materials from the ocean floor.

label: Warehouse
original_definition: A Storage Facility that is designed to store commercial goods.
enriched_definition: A storage facility that is designed to store large quantities of commercial goods and materials for distribution or sale.

label: Washing Facility
original_definition: A Facility that is designed to wash personnel or equipment.
enriched_definition: A facility that is designed to enable the cleaning of personnel or equipment through the application of water and cleaning agents.

label: Waste Management Facility
original_definition: A Facility that is designed for managing waste for some portion of the waste's existence.
enriched_definition: A Facility that is designed to collect, process, treat, store, or dispose of waste materials during one or more phases of the waste lifecycle.

label: Water Tower
original_definition: A Facility that is the bearer of functions realized in processes of storing water in an elevated container.
enriched_definition: A Facility that is designed to store water in an elevated container and is the bearer of functions that are realized in processes of storing and distributing water through gravitational pressure.

label: Water Treatment Facility
original_definition: A Facility that is designed for making water more acceptable for a specific end-use.
enriched_definition: A Facility that is designed to process water through physical, chemical, or biological methods to remove contaminants and improve water quality for a designated end-use purpose.

label: Weapon Manufacturing Facility
original_definition: A Factory that is designed to produce or assemble weapons.
enriched_definition: A manufacturing facility that is designed to produce or assemble weapons.

label: Wind Farm
original_definition: An Electric Power Station that is designed to convert the wind's kinetic energy into electrical power by means of wind turbines.
enriched_definition: An Electric Power Station that is designed to convert kinetic energy from wind into electrical energy by means of multiple wind turbines arranged across a designated area.
